title: Ayesha Khan calls out AI misuse says morphed content is becoming normalised
description: Ayesha Khan spoke out against the misuse of artificial intelligence after morphed images and videos of her surfaced online, calling the trend “very scary.”
content: Actor Ayesha Khan has opened up about the dark side of artificial intelligence, revealing that morphed images and videos of her have been circulating online. The actor said the growing misuse of AI is alarming and disturbing, stressing that such inci... [2178 chars]

title: Amid gloom, H-1B visas find new use as US tech giants hire AI talent
description: H-1B visa news: As US tech giants rush to expand their operations within the Artificial Intelligence sector, they are becoming increasingly dependent on hiring foreign workers via the H-1B visa to continue their push, according to a Forbes report. However, measures by the Trump administration to limit the H-1B visa may not only reduce hiring, but also erode the competitive edge the US enjoys in AI development.
content: US technology companies' push into artificial intelligence is driving strong demand for H-1B visa holders in AI-related roles, according to a report by Forbes. This comes amid the Trump administration's crackdown on foreign hiring by tech companies, ... [5535 chars]

title: Beyond The Bubble: Why 2026 Will Be The Year AI Replaces Human Workers
description: Introduction: The Great AI Deception of 2025 Last year, pundits and skeptics declared artificial intelligence had hit a wall. They claimed the AI bubble was deflating, that machine cognition had plateaued, and that human ingenuity would remain irreplaceable. They were catastrophically wrong. The year 2026 has arrived, and with it, a seismic shift. The narrative […]

title: Cyprus connects to Greek supercomputer as it enters AI race
description: A new data centre in Cyprus will connect to the Greek artificial intelligence factory and will use the computing power of the Greek DAIDALOS system
content:
Cyprus is taking a major step into artificial intelligence development with the launch of its AI Factory, which will connect to Greece's Pharos facility to share advanced computing resources.

title: Use tech to hone skills, improve potential: PM Narendra Modi to students
description: The prime minister urged students not to be afraid of emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence, but use them to hone their skills and improve potential. The prime minister also urged students to practice previous papers and have a good sleep to perform better in examinations.
content:

title: The Unfeeling Calculus of Superintelligence: Why AI Doesn’t Hate You, You’re Just Resource Competition
description: Introduction: The Ant Hill of Humanity We are told to fear a vengeful, Skynet-style artificial intelligence, a malicious digital god that despises humanity and seeks our destruction out of spite. This is a comforting narrative because it implies a familiar, almost human, emotional driver: hatred. It suggests that if we could just make the machine like us, […]
